package.name: fanuc_lrmate200ic5l_moveit_config

description.p: MoveIt package for the Fanuc LR Mate 200iC/5L.
An automatically generated package with all the configuration and launch files for using the Fanuc LR Mate 200iC/5L with the MoveIt Motion Planning Framework.
NB: this package currently uses the default MoveIt acceleration limits (ie: 1/5th of joint velocity limits), instead of the true acceleration limits for this manipulator (see issue 49).

package.author: MoveIt Setup Assistant
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
